item.description:
Please join us for 2 hours of tennis!  We booked 2 courts so a maximum of 8 people can play.  The meetup will cost $20/person.  We are requesting that you pre-pay when you sign up.  If you've signed up and cannot attend anymore, please update your RSVP at least a day in advance so that those waitlisted are notified and you can get reimbursed.

 

Please make sure to show up  at the event 15 min early so we can do check in and court assignments.

 

If you've enjoyed playing with our group and would like to support us, please consider donating $5/year to cover the yearly cost of running the group.  Members can pay online via PayPal or give cash/check to Melissa or any of the assistant organizers (Brandon/Elise/Mary Kate) at an event.  Thank you for your support!!!

 

Signup deadline: Tues, 1/15 end of day
item.name: Indoor tennis at Trull Brook!
